'News-Letter' On Radio
"College
News," a regular
weekly feature broadcast over
station WCAO, will present highlights from columns of the NEWSLETTER this afternoon from 5.30
to 5.45. The announcer, Billy
Shriver, familiar as the "Arrow
News Reporters—Up to the minute news," will also read some
newspaper comments on the Athletic Plan.
Last Friday, Murray Kempton
substituted for Tom Ellis, captain
of the football eleven, in speaking
over WCAO in a pre-St. John's
game interview. Murray wrote the
script and had to,
Atee b at, the
last minute to put in a word for
the alma mater.
A future program is being whipped into shape that will include
aspects of college life and activities throughout Maryland.
